content:
Inside

Darmstadt | 25.02.2023 | Political scientist and researcher Writer Volkan Yaraşır and Atik Co -Chairman Süleyman Gürcan participated as a speaker. In the first part of the panel, which was held as two parts, the speakers evaluated the history of the Middle East geography and peoples from the historical process to this day.
The imperialists' ambition of saturated market, the attractiveness of the underground natural riches, the characteristics of the geographical position of the geographical location of a continuous war area, the brutally, brutal blood, tears drowned in a geography, and even more savage was grown.
On October 7, 2023, under the leadership of Kassam Brigades, the Zionist Israeli state was also evaluated. It was stated that this action was manipulated by the imperialists consciously and left in the shadow of the reactionary Hamas organization, with which Zionist Israel and its supporters were asked to hide the genocide crime committed by the US and European imperialists, and the rightful resistance of the Filstin people wanted to be terrorized. It was emphasized that we should condemn the attacks on the civilian Hamas organization and that the right to criticize the reactionary Hamas organization was a part of the liberation struggle of the Palestinian people.
In the second part, the panel was terminated as an enthusiastic and highly efficient interview with the questions, opinions and evaluations of the audience.
